welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Darby, a charming city known for its scenic landscapes and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that Darby has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport houses all arrivals and departures for domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport serves all international flights and provides customs and immigration services.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network ILG Free WiFi.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
